title: [Bug] Dunk Master Darius skin not playing voice over for buying items
body:
I own the dunk master Darius skin and i love it but i have found when you buy the items he's supposed to have the voice over too he doesnt always say it. 

I have found it happens mostly when you teleport back to base and buy the item the voice over fails
Or when you just respawn then buy the item the voice over fails to play

I have found if you refund the item and rebuy it he will say it but it takes several tries

it's a 15 dollar skin it shouldnt have a bug like that. sion and braum never fail in their voice overs for items and you can buy those champs with IP.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on.

EDIT: 

Okay! 

So, I spoke with the audio guy, and the VO that plays when you buy items is intentionally set to only play a percentage of the time, so it's not always going to play. 

Hope that clears things up!
Since it was brought up,  why do champions like Braum and Karthus always say those lines, as well as skins like Primetime Draven, but not Dunkmaster Darius? It seems a bit odd.

actuly all the other champs who say things when you buy items like braum, karthus and now tristana say it everytime you buy the item that's why i bothered making this post. It's bad when you pay 15 dollars for a skin and it fails to say the cool VO's you enjoy where as champs you can get for free says their VO's for items every time.
